definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, typically used as a surname of English origin, derived from the given name 'Lawrence' or from a place name meaning 'from the linden tree grove'.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个专有名词，通常作为英语姓氏使用，源自名字 'Lawrence'，或源于地名，意为 '来自椴树林'。
definitions.example_en: Dr. Lawson presented the findings at the international conference.
definitions.example_cn: 劳森博士在国际会议上展示了研究成果。
